attributes.action: recognise both Rik Mayall and Adrian Edmondson in the New Years Honours list
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The double act between Rik Mayall and Ade Edmondson has changed the face of British comedy over the past 30 years.

Together they pioneered the 'alternative' comedy movement in the early eighties, and over the last two decades have  bought the successful anarchic sitcoms "The Young Ones" and "Bottom" to our television screens. They built on their success with numerous national theatre tours, and a film, and gained a massive  following.

They have also each found great solo success, most noticeably Rik with "The New Statesman" and Ade in "Holby City" and "Jonathan Creek".

We would like to see them both named in the honours list for their services to comedy.
